variable.name: shareid
variable.description: Framingham Heart Study participant SHARe ID number

variable.name: raw1
variable.description: P-selectin raw OD Reading for first well

variable.name: conc1
variable.description: P-selectin concentration for first well(sample type: plasma)
variable.comment: If CONC1 was less than or equal to the lowest detectable limit of 0.5 ng/mL, then CONC1 was set to 0.5 ng/mL.

variable.name: raw2
variable.description: P-selecctin raw OD reading for second well
variable.value: Unknown or only run in singleton

variable.name: conc2
variable.description: P-selectin concentration for second well(sample type: plasma)
variable.comment: If CONC2 was less than or equal to the lowest detectable limit of 0.5 ng/mL, then CONC2 was set to 0.5 ng/mL.
variable.value: Unknown or only run in singleton

variable.name: mresult
variable.comment: The mean result was only calculated if the sample was done in duplicate. To keep results consistent, the first concentration was used as the final PSELECTIN reading for all samples (variable: PSELECTIN).
variable.value: Unknown or only run in singleton

variable.name: pselectin
variable.comment: For flag = 1, 2 or 3, PSELECTIN is the same as CONC1 regardless of whether the sample was done in duplicate or not. If PSELECTIN was less than or equal to the lowest detectable limit of 0.5 ng/mL, then PSELECTIN was set to 0.5 ng/mL. PSELECTIN broken down by individual flag is as follows:0.851 - 250.390 for flag = 19.976 - 129.142 for flag = 218.756 - 104.656 for flag = 3.

variable.name: flag
variable.comment: When doing analysis, use the variable PSELECTIN where flag = 1 and 2. Phantoms have their FHS ID number listed under IDTYPE and ID, with their phantom id number listed under PHANTOM_ID. When looking at phantom samples, use flag = 3 records as well as their correspondiing FHS ID numbers in either flag = 1 or 2.
variable.value: FHS samples that can be used for analysis, done in singleton
FHS samples that can be used for analysis, done in duplicate

variable.name: phantom_id
variable.comment: Phantoms have their FHS ID number listed under IDTYPE and ID, with their phantom id number listed under PHANTOM_ID.

variable.name: blcor1
variable.description: P-selectin baseline corrected OD reading for first well

variable.name: blcor2
variable.description: P-selectin baseline corrected OD reading for second well
variable.value: Unknown or only run in singleton
